name: Satyr

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The satyr has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the satyr pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Mockery
actions.description: *Wisdom Saving Throw:* DC 12, one creature the satyr can see within 90 feet. *Failure:* 5 (1d6 + 2) Psychic damage.

lore:
*Horned and Hoofed Revelers*
**Habitat:** Forest, Planar (Feywild); **Treasure:** Implements
Satyrs embody the untamed joys of the wilderness. They indulge in sprees of merrymakingâ€”eating, drinking, performing, fighting, and frolicking.
Satyrs enjoy demonstrating their physicality through contests, evicting party poopers, and defending Fey realms.
Satyr revelmasters use magical music to change the moods of other creatures. They do so to keep their celebrations exciting and to ward off foes.
